helper-html-ActionLink-razor.description:
Html.ActionLink: 
 Return an anchor element (a element) for the specified link text, action and controller.

helper-html-Action-razor.description:
Html.Action: 
 Invokes the specified child action method using the specified controller name and return the result as an HTML string.

helper-html-AntiForgeryToken-razor.description:
Html.AntiForgeryToken: 
 Invokes the specified child action method using the specified controller name and return the result as an HTML string.

helper-html-CheckBox-razor.description:
Html.CheckBox: 
 Returns a check box input element by using the specified HTML helper and the name of the form field.

helper-View-Data-razor.description:
ViewData: 
 Gets or sets a dictionary that contains data to pass between the controller and the view.

helper-renderbody-razor.description:
RenderBody: 
 In a Razor layout page, renders the portion of a content page that is not within a named section.

helper-model-view-razor.description:
model: 
 By including a @model statement at the top of the view template file, you can specify the type of object that the view expects.
